pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | Protection of your personal data Home About HOW TO PLAY FAQ'S DOWNLOAD APP Privacy Policy At Dream11, we prioritize the protection of your privacy. This Privacy Policy delineates how we gather, utilize, and safeguard your personal information. 1. Information We Collect: - We may collect personal information, such as your name, email address, and contact number, when you engage our services or subscribe to our updates. - Additionally, we gather non-personal information like your IP address, browser specifications, and device details to enhance our website's functionality and service offerings. 2. Utilization of Your Information: - Your personal details are employed to process orders, facilitate communication, and deliver customer assistance. - Non-personal information may be utilized for analytics, marketing endeavors, and refining our online platform. 3. Information Disclosure: - We do not trade, sell, or lease your personal information to external parties. However, we may share your data with trusted service providers who support us in website operations and service provision. 4. Data Protection Measures: - Stringent security protocols are implemented to safeguard your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. 5. Your Rights: - You retain the rights to access, amend, or erase your personal data. Additionally, you can opt out of receiving promotional communications from us. 6. Policy Amendments: - We reserve the prerogative to update or revise this Privacy Policy at any time. Any alterations will take effect immediately upon posting on our website. Should you have queries or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please reach out to us at dream11@gmail.com. Thank you for choosing Dream11! pages.cookies: Cookies Policy | Protection of your personal data Home About HOW TO PLAY FAQ'S DOWNLOAD APP Dream11 Cookies Policy At Dream11, safeguarding your privacy and ensuring your security is paramount. Our Cookies Policy outlines the use of cookies on our platform to enrich your user experience and deliver personalized content. By continuing to utilize our app, you agree to the utilization of cookies as delineated in this policy. What are cookies? Cookies are tiny text files stored on your device when you visit a website or utilize an app. They gather data on your browsing habits and preferences, aiding the website or app in offering a tailored user experience. How we use cookies: To retain your preferences and settings, like language preferences and login details. To monitor your interactions with our platform, including visited pages and utilized features. To analyze user behavior and enhance our app's performance and functionality. To furnish personalized content and recommendations based on your interests and activities on the app. Types of cookies we use: We employ both session cookies (temporary, deleted upon closing the app) and persistent cookies (stored on your device for an extended period). We also use first-party cookies (set by Dream11) and third-party cookies (set by external service providers). Your cookie preferences: You have the option to accept or decline cookies on Dream11 by adjusting your browser or device settings. However, please be aware that disabling cookies may impact the functionality and performance of our app. Changes to this policy: We may periodically update this Cookies Policy to reflect alterations in our practices or legal requirements. We encourage regular review of this policy to stay informed about our cookie usage. For any inquiries or concerns regarding our cookie usage, please contact us at dream11@gmail.com. Thank you for choosing Dream11! About At Dream11, we transform the cricketing passion of millions into an immersive fantasy sports experience. Founded with a vision to bring fans closer to the game they love, Dream11 has grown into the ultimate platform for fantasy cricket enthusiasts. Here, every match is more than just a game—it's an opportunity to showcase your strategic acumen, engage with a vibrant community, and feel the thrill of competition. We empower users to create their dream teams, combining the skills of their favorite players to outwit opponents. Our dynamic and user-friendly interface ensures that both seasoned players and newcomers can enjoy the excitement of fantasy sports with ease. Dream11 is not just about winning; it’s about the joy of the game, the camaraderie among fans, and the thrill of making informed decisions. With regular updates, live scores, and comprehensive player stats, we ensure you’re always in the game, making the most of every cricketing moment. Join us at Dream11, where your cricketing dreams take flight and every match is a new adventure! Get app link WHY Dream11 MOST POPULAR? Innovative Gameplay Experience: Dream11 offers a unique and immersive gameplay experience that blends strategic thinking with the excitement of live sports. Users can select their dream teams, make real-time decisions, and feel like they are part of the game. Massive Prize Pools: Dream11 features some of the largest prize pools in the fantasy sports industry. This attracts players who are not only looking for fun but also the chance to win substantial rewards. The prospect of winning big makes the competition even more thrilling. Real-Time Player Insights: Dream11 provides up-to-date player statistics and performance analysis, ensuring users make informed decisions when building their teams. The real-time insights help users strategize better and increase their chances of winning. Community Engagement: Dream11 hosts vibrant community forums where fans can interact, discuss strategies, share tips, and celebrate victories. This sense of community fosters engagement and loyalty among users, making the platform more than just a game. Customized Contests: One of Dream11's unique features is the ability for users to create private contests with friends and family. This personalization adds a layer of fun and competition among close circles, enhancing the overall user experience. Community Engagement: At Dream11, we foster a vibrant community of cricket enthusiasts. Our platform encourages interaction, friendly competition, and collaboration among fans. Share your strategies, discuss matches, and connect with like-minded individuals from around the world. Multi-Sport Platform: While cricket remains the flagship sport, Dream11 has expanded to include other popular sports like football, basketball, and kabaddi. This diversity attracts a broader audience and keeps the platform dynamic and engaging throughout the year. Celebrity Endorsements: Dream11 is backed by prominent cricket players and celebrities, lending credibility and attracting their fanbase to the platform. These endorsements also boost visibility and trust among new users. User-Friendly Interface: Dream11’s app and website are designed with user experience in mind. The intuitive and easy-to-navigate interface ensures that both seasoned players and newcomers can effortlessly enjoy the game. The smooth design enhances user satisfaction and keeps them coming back for more. Get a Sneak Peek of the Dream11 App Get the Dream11 App Now! Download the Dream11 app today and dive into the ultimate fantasy cricket experience! Build your dream team, compete in exciting contests, and stand a chance to win amazing prizes. With real-time player insights, a user-friendly interface, and the ability to join or create private leagues, Dream11 brings the thrill of the game right to your fingertips. Don’t wait – join millions of fans worldwide and make every match a new adventure. Get the Dream11 app now and start playing! Visit windaily.co and select the "Download for Android" option. Once the apk has finished downloading, simply tap on "Open". Ensure that installation from unknown sources is enabled in your device's settings. Dream11 FANTASY CRICKET: A GUIDE TO PLAYING Step 1:Download and Register: Get the App: Download the Dream11 app from the App Store or Google Play. Create an Account: Sign up using your email, phone number, or social media accounts. Step 2: Select a Match: Browse Matches: Explore upcoming cricket matches listed on the Dream11 platform. Choose Your Game: Select the match you want to participate in from the available options. Step 3: Build Your Team: Select Captain and Vice-Captain: Assign the roles carefully as they earn 2x and 1.5x points respectively. Save Your Team: Finalize and save your team before the match deadline. Step 4: Join Contests and Play: Find Contests: Browse and join contests with different entry fees and prize pools. Monitor Performance: Track your players’ real-time performance and score during the match. FAQ'S Can I create my own private contest on Dream11? Yes, you can create private contests on Dream11 to compete with your friends and family. Simply choose the match, set the entry fee, and invite others to join. How are points awarded for player performance? Points are awarded based on various performance metrics like runs scored, wickets taken, catches, and more. Captains and vice-captains earn extra points for their performances. What happens if a selected player doesn't play in the match? If a player you selected doesn't play in the match, you won't earn any points for them. It's important to stay updated with the team line-ups before the match begins. Can I change my team after creating it? Yes, you can make unlimited changes to your team before the match deadline. Once the match starts, no further changes can be made. What are the different types of contests available on Dream11? Dream11 offers various contests including Mega Contests, Head-to-Head, Small Leagues, and Practice Contests. Each type has different entry fees and prize structures. How do I withdraw my winnings from Dream11? You can withdraw your winnings directly to your bank account. Go to the "My Winnings" section, enter your bank details, and submit a withdrawal request. Are there any bonuses or promotions for new users? Yes, Dream11 often provides welcome bonuses and promotional offers for new users. Keep an eye on the promotions page for the latest deals and bonuses. Is Dream11 legal and safe to play? Yes, Dream11 is legal in most states in India and operates under the fantasy sports laws. It employs robust security measures to ensure a safe and fair gaming experience for all users.
